name: Szép Étterem

description: Indulge in classic Polish recipes in a quaint setting, reminiscent of Warsaw's charm.

description: A haven for seafood lovers, offering fresh catches in a delightful riverside setting.

description: Relive the romance of Italy with dishes crafted with passion and flair.

description: Set on the banks of the Danube, enjoy meals that resonate with the city's heartbeat.

description: Tucked away in Krakow, this eatery showcases Poland's culinary traditions.
